rules.query: select "User Count" as atype, userId as id, count(*) as figure from inChannel [ RANGE 1 MINUTE slide 1 seconds] group by userId
select "Page Count" as atype, pageId as id, count(*) as figure from inChannel [ RANGE 1 MINUTE slide 1 seconds] group by pageId
select "Active User" as atype, "0" as id, count(distinct userId) as figure from inChannel [ RANGE 1 MINUTE slide 1 seconds]
select "Record" as atype, userId as id, pageId as figure from inChannel [NOW]
